Name.description: A display name for the dataset

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource

CreatedTime.description: The time that this dataset was created

LastUpdatedTime.description: The last time that this dataset was updated

ImportMode.description: Indicates whether you want to import the data into SPICE

ConsumedSpiceCapacityInBytes.description: The amount of SPICE capacity used by this dataset

DataSetUsageConfiguration.description: The usage configuration to apply to child datasets that reference this dataset as a source

PhysicalTableMap.description: Declares the physical tables that are available in the underlying data sources

LogicalTableMap.description: Configures the combination and transformation of the data from the physical tables

OutputColumns.description: The list of columns after all transforms

ColumnGroups.description: Groupings of columns that work together in certain Amazon QuickSight features

FieldFolders.description: The folder that contains fields and nested subfolders for your dataset

RowLevelPermissionDataSet.description: The row-level security configuration for the dataset

ColumnLevelPermissionRules.description: A set of one or more definitions of a ColumnLevelPermissionRule

Principal.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal

Actions.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on

Permissions.description: A list of resource permissions on the dataset
